children.name: loaded
children.description: Gets or sets the loaded flag of the Node. Setting the loaded flag to `false` allows reloading of child items.

children.name: load
children.description: Loads the child nodes in the child data source, supplying the `id` of the Node to the request.

children.name: level
Example - get the level of the node

children.description: Gets the current nesting level of the node within the data source.

children.name: append

parameters.name: model `Object|kendo.data.Node`
parameters.description: The data for the new item

children.description: Appends a new item to the children data source, and initializes it if necessary.
